quotes.text: Set your goals high and don't stop till you get there.
quotes.author: Bo Jackson

quotes.text: A goal without a plan is just a wish.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exup√©ry

quotes.text: The only limit to the height of your achievements is the reach of your dreams and your willingness to work for them.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: The future depends on what you do today.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.text: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: Goals are dreams with deadlines.
quotes.author: Diana Scharf

quotes.text: The harder the conflict, the greater the triumph.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.text: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.text: Small steps lead to big changes.
quotes.author: James Clear

quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Your goals are the road maps that guide you and show you what is possible for your life.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.text: The difference between a dream and a goal is a deadline.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: Progress is impossible without change, and those who cannot change their minds cannot change anything.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.text: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.text: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.text: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
